Name: Lucia
Text: Let us move forward, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Text: Hit enemies continuously with <color=#ffda58>Basic Attack</color> to gain <color=#ffda58>[Skill Orbs]</color>.

Name: Lucia
Text: Tap <color=#ffda58>[Skill Orbs]</color> to trigger the Exclusive Skill.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Identity authentication passed... Environment parameters setup complete... Battle data loaded... Guide tutorial activated.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Good afternoon. Welcome to the simulated training program. Please follow the guide and complete the training course.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Please note that the Matrix feature is not loaded in the data space due to poor compatibility.

Name: Guide AI
Text: In this space, <color=#ffda58>[Dashing]</color> does not consume Energy. Please use this to your advantage.

Name: Guide AI
Text: The first part of the tutorial is over. Please tap the direction key to move on and complete the remaining course.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Now let's move on to the second part of the tutorial. The <color=#ffda58>[Leap]</color> feature is loaded. Please tap the <color=#ffda58>[Leap]</color> button to try it out.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Test complete. No errors found.

Name: Guide AI
Text: <size=26>Use the <color=#ffda58>[Leap]</color> feature wisely to avoid some of the rugged terrains and small obstacles that can't be avoided by dashing or walking. Please try to <color=#ffda58>[Leap]</color> over the gap ahead.</size>

Name: Guide AI
Text: <size=30>You have successfully crossed the gap with the <color=#ffda58>[Leap]</color> feature. The second part of the tutorial is over. Please move on.</size>

Name: Guide AI
Text: Now let's start the third part of the tutorialâ€”the tutorial about <color=#ffda58>[Data Hunt Positioning Anchors]</color>. Please pay attention to the red column ahead.

Name: Guide AI
Text: <size=26>Tap the <color=#ffda58>[Attack]</color> button to hit the <color=#ffda58>[Instant Trigger]</color> and activate the corresponding mechanism in the map. Now please hit the <color=#ffda58>[Instant Trigger]</color> to open the gate.</size>

Name: Guide AI
Text: Core ability <color=#ffda58>[Data Hunt Positioning Anchor]</color> unlocked. Guide tutorial started.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Multiple versions of <color=#ffda58>[Data Hunt Positioning Anchors]</color> are in development at the same time. The one unlocked is the <color=#ffda58>[Bio Devourer]</color>.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Use the Positioning Anchor wisely to leap over rugged terrains, perform Data positioning hunt, and realize other features.

Name: Guide AI
Text: When there is a connectable <color=#ffda58>[Anchor Port]</color> within the cast range of the <color=#ffda58>[Data Hunt Positioning Anchors]</color>,

Name: Guide AI
Text: <color=#ffda58>[Pull]</color> yourself to the <color=#ffda58>[Anchor Port]</color> with the Positioning Anchor.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Please adjust your vision to select the <color=#ffda58>[Anchor Port]</color>.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Tap the <color=#ffda58>[Positioning Anchor]</color> button to <color=#ffda58>[Pull]</color> yourself to the <color=#ffda58>[Anchor Port]</color>.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Some of the unactivated <color=#ffda58>[Anchor Ports]</color> also need to be activated with the <color=#ffda58>[Instant Trigger]</color>.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Tap the <color=#ffda58>[Attack]</color> button to hit the <color=#ffda58>[Instant Trigger]</color> to activate the silent <color=#ffda58>[Anchor Port]</color>.

Name: Guide AI
Text: <color=#ffda58>[Pull]</color> yourself to the <color=#ffda58>[Anchor Port]</color> with the Positioning Anchor to pass over the platform and keep moving.

Name: Guide AI
Text: <size=26>Now let's move on to the training of the <color=#ffda58>[Data Hunt Positioning Anchor]</color>. Please use the Positioning Anchor properly to connect to the <color=#ffda58>[Anchor Port]</color> and advance to the next target point over the rugged terrain.</size>

Name: Guide AI
Text: Look for a suitable route to reach the next target point.

Name: Guide AI
Text: <size=26>This is the end of the tutorial on <color=#ffda58>[Explore]</color>. Next up is the tutorial on Data <color=#ffda58>[Hunting]</color>. Please advance to the training field to complete the remaining content of the tutorial.</size>

Name: Guide AI
Text: You have arrived at the training field.

Name: Guide AI
Text: The target ahead is a large simulated <color=#ffda58>[Data]</color>. Don't worry. It will not attack you.

Name: Guide AI
Text: <size=26>In the <color=#ffda58>[Anchor Realm]</color>, the target enemy will be locked in battle. In this tutorial, only Auto Lock is allowed. Please set Manual Lock in other environments.</size>

Name: Guide AI
Text: Use the <color=#ffda58>[Pull]</color> feature of the <color=#ffda58>[Data Hunt Positioning Anchor]</color> to pull yourself quickly to the locked <color=#ffda58>[Data]</color>.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Use the <color=#ffda58>[Lock]</color> button to select the <color=#ffda58>[Data]</color>.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Target selected. Please use the <color=#ffda58>[Data Hunt Positioning Anchor]</color> to quickly get close to the target.

Name: Guide AI
Text: <size=26>In the <color=#ffda58>[Anchor Realm]</color>, attacks on specific parts and using Core Passive can speed up the cracking process of their firewalls.</size>

Name: Guide AI
Text: Certain parts of the <color=#ffda58>[Data]</color> will be hackable after their firewall has been completely cracked.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Please try to hack the head or fore limbs of the <color=#ffda58>[Data]</color>.

Name: Guide AI
Text: After the <color=#ffda58>[Data]</color> is hit and becomes immobile, all characters on the battlefield can achieve the <color=#ffda58>[3-Ping]</color> effect once with one Skill Orb.

Name: Guide AI
Text: <size=30>A Data Gap will appear on the broken part. Use the <color=#ffda58>[Hunt]</color> feature of the <color=#ffda58>[Data Hunt Positioning Anchor]</color> on the Data Gap.</size>

Name: Guide AI
Text: Tap the Positioning Anchor and <color=#ffda58>[Hunt]</color> the Data Gap.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Enter the <color=#ffda58>[Hunting]</color> form to launch Basic <color=#ffda58>[Attacks]</color> and accumulate <color=#ffda58>[Signal Orbs]</color>.

Name: Guide AI
Text: In actual combat, <color=#ffda58>[Signal Orbs]</color> are generated twice as fast as on the ground.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Ping <color=#ffda58>[Signal Orb]</color> to deal greater DMG. Pinging an orb will ping the adjacent orbs of the same color.

Name: Guide AI
Text: <size=26>If there are <color=#ffda58>[3 consecutive Signal Orbs]</color> of the <color=#ffda58>[same color]</color> after the <color=#ffda58>[Signal Orb]</color> Ping, up to two <color=#ffda58>[Auto Pings]</color> will be triggered and deal massive damage.</size>

Name: Guide AI
Text: <size=26>After <color=#ffda58>[Auto Ping]</color> is activated, the skill bar will become a colorful orb bar, and an orb of different colors can be counted as an orb of the same color and <color=#ffda58>[Auto Pinged]</color>. This effect can be triggered twice, after that, the colorful orb bar will not be triggered again.</size>

Name: Guide AI
Text: The basic tutorial is over. Advanced tutorial started.

Name: Guide AI
Text: The <color=#ffda58>[Hunting]</color> form will only last for a limited time in real battle against the <color=#ffda58>[Data]</color>.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Deal enough DMG within the time limit to make the <color=#ffda58>[Data Piercing Rate]</color> displayed on the <color=#ffda58>[top of the screen]</color> reach 100.

Name: Guide AI
Text: <color=#ffda58>[Data Hunt Positioning Anchor]</color> will completely <color=#ffda58>[Fix]</color> the Data Gap part to the ground.

Name: Guide AI
Text: <size=26>When all the fragile parts have been <color=#ffda58>[fixed]</color>, the Data will be completely located and <color=#ffda58>[Orbital Buster]</color> can be triggered to eliminate the <color=#ffda58>[Data]</color>.</size>

Name: Guide AI
Text: Next up, the operational training.

Name: Guide AI
Text: With the target locked, damage the head or front limb of the <color=#ffda58>[Data]</color>.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Hackable part detected. You can use the <color=#ffda58>[Hunt]</color> feature on that part.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Incomplete <color=#ffda58>[Fixing]</color> requirement(s). Training data has been reset. You can now try again.

Name: Guide AI
Text: You can also leave through the evacuation point in the back and end the tutorial.

Name: Guide AI
Text: <size=26>In case you want to enter the <color=#ffda58>[Hunting]</color> form again, move the left joystick to attack the broken part to trigger the Data Gap and then start the <color=#ffda58>[Hunt]</color>.</size>

Name: Guide AI
Text: Combat training completed. Please advance to the evacuation point to exit the simulated training program.

Name: Guide AI
Text: test\nGrimhorn is gathering strength to deal massive damage. When it finishes, it will cast Haven-Shaking Crash.

Name: Guide AI
Text: test\nBut it is also off guard when charging, so you can climb up the columns rising up in the scene to deal DMG to it.

Name: Lucia
Text: Nice Job

Name: Celica
Text: Welcome to <color=#ffda58>Magic Square Bounce</color>, Commandant! Now let me walk you through everything.

Name: Celica
Text: During this challenge, observe Shark-speare's <color=#ffda58>Movement Path</color> and dodge or counterattack accordingly.

Name: Celica
Text: You will be given <color=#ffda58>1000 points</color> as reward at the beginning. And the final result will be calculated based on personal and team scores!

Name: Celica
Text: The stage has a <color=#ffda58>time limit</color>. It includes multiple rounds with each round made up of <color=#ffda58>two phases</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Now let's enter Phase 1: <color=#ffda58>Dodging Phase</color>. Pay attention to Shark-speare's obstacle skills and dodge them accordingly.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Pushing Baffle</color>: A baffle that appears in a random direction. It can force the character to move.

Name: Celica
Text: Leap to skip and avoid the baffle.

Name: Celica
Text: If you <color=#FF6287>fall off the platform</color>, you will <color=#ffda58>respawn</color> at a random point with a certain amount of points <color=#FF6287>deducted</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Horizontal Beam</color>: A beam that appears in a random direction. It stuns anyone who touches it.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Dodge</color> to avoid the light beams.

Name: Celica
Text: You will be <color=#ffda58>stunned</color> with points <color=#FF6287>deducted</color> for a failed dodge.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Expanding Halo</color>: Shark-speare rises up into the air to charge and then smashes the ground, generating an Expanding Halo.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Dodge</color> or <color=#ffda58>Leap</color> to avoid the halo.

Name: Celica
Text: You will be stunned if you touch the halo.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Charged Strike</color>: Shark-speare will <color=#ffda58>stun</color> and push a random player away.

Name: Celica
Text: You could be <color=#FF6287>pushed off the stage</color> when hit by a Charged Strike.

Name: Celica
Text: After casting a skill, Shark-speare will enter Phase 2: <color=#ffda58>Explosion Phase</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: You will get three special <color=#ffda58>Skill Orbs</color> during this phase. Use them to carry the bombs of the corresponding colors.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#00FF00>Green Bomb</color>: Will cause an explosion around you in a <color=#00FF00>3x3 area</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#FFFF00>Yellow Bomb</color>: Will cause an explosion around you in a <color=#FFFF00>cross-shaped area</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#69FFFF>Blue Bomb</color>: Will cause an explosion around you in a <color=#69FFFF>Diagonal path</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: During this phase, Shark-speare will release bombs that will explode at the end of the countdown as well.

Name: Celica
Text: The <color=#FF6287>red zone</color> is Shark-speare's explosion area. You will have your <color=#FF6287>points deducted</color> when in the red zone.

Name: Celica
Text: The bomb will explode based on your location by the end of the countdown.

Name: Celica
Text: Move wisely based on the bomb's exploration range to attack Shark-speare.

Name: Celica
Text: When you <color=#ffda58>hit</color> Shark-speare with a bomb, it will deal damage and increase your points.

Name: Celica
Text: You'll be given a <color=#FF6287>1.5x</color> bonus when <color=#FF6287>three</color> people use the same color and a <color=#FF9D64>1.3x</color> bonus when <color=#FF9D64>two</color> use the same color.

Name: Celica
Text: When 2 people hit the target with bombs of the same color, it will deal 1.3x damage and grant 1.3x points.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Killing</color> Shark-speare in advance will grant extra <color=#ffda58>kill points</color> and <color=#ffda58>remaining time bonus points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In the game, we can <color=#ffda58>help</color> stunned teammates.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Approach</color> a stunned teammate to remove the stunned status and <color=#ffda58>earn points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Congratulations! You've finished the tutorial! Hurry up and start a real battle!
